title: How to Bake a Feather Cake

steps.headline: Sift flour and baking powder together.
steps.description: (You can use a sieve over a separate mixing bowl for this.)

steps.headline: Add dry ingredients alternately with the milk.
Beat well until batter thickens and looks smooth.
Pour into greased and floured loaf pan.
Bake until golden and cake tests done.

text: Cream the butter and sugar.  Gradually beat in eggs.  Sift flour and baking powder together. (You can use a sieve over a separate mixing bowl for this.) Add dry ingredients alternately with the milk.  Add flavoring,  Beat well until batter thickens and looks smooth.  Pour into greased and floured loaf pan.  Bake until golden and cake tests done.  Finished.
